name: Yin Yang Messenger
description:
Gameplay Instruction:

Move with WASD

Use SPACE to jump (double jump is possible)

Use TAB to switch between Yin and Yang states.

Introduction:

This is a game demo of a 2D Platformer Puzzle.

In traditional Chinese culture, the rooster is one of the symbols of the Yang. In this game, you will play the role of a messenger who can switch between Yin and Yang, bringing messages to the soul in the tomb.

You will encounter evil dogs, evil spirits, kind spirits, and naughty ghosts, as well as little pigs who only care about eating. Use the state of Yin and Yang flexibly, and pay attention to the last words of the soul in the grave.

Enjoy :)
